author: schneiml
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is extracted from #28316, the first in a series to eventually replace #28316.

It replaces the direct invocations of `cms.EDAnalyzer("QualityTester", ...)`  with calls to an alias, to allow changing the module type of `QualityTester` to `EDProducer` in the future.

This PR touches lots of packages, but does not include *any* functional changes. Most of the changes are machine-generated.

#### PR validation:

No functional changes, alias seems to work.
title: DQM: Configuration alias for QualityTester
